name: Stalewater
description:
Welcome to Stalewater!

The Old West was a violent place, but no place was more violent and bloody than Stalewater. This town has been home to outlaws, vagabonds and ne'er-do-wells since the end of the great "Rock Rush" of 1842. The depletion of minerals by greedy prospectors drained any dreams of Stalewater becoming anything more than a forgotten speck on the map.

You play as a young man by the name of Marshall, Marshall McGraw, who finds himself awakened in a jail cell in Stalewater. Not sure of how he arrived in Stalewater, or what he was supposed to be doing, Marshall must now help bring law and order to Stalewater!

Features:

  • Lifelike facial animation!
  • Fully voiced characters & dialogue trees!
  • Ragdolls!
  • Location-based damage!
  • Explosions!
  • A familiar face voice...

Free assets and music used listed in Credits.txt
